property.name: Neuron morphology
property.description: Neuron morphology resource used to generate this report

property.name: Validation rules
property.description: Set of rules that where used against a morphology to generate this report.

property.name: Dangling branch
property.description: Position (3D) of dangling branches (as pairs of nodes are involved, the position is the one of the node closer to the soma)

property.name: Z-jump
property.description: Position (3D) of z-jumps (as pairs of nodes are involved, the position is the one of the node closer to the soma)

property.name: Number of children
property.description: Position (3D) of the nodes that have more children than the threshold

property.name: Diameter change
property.description: Position (3D) of the nodes that have an inapropriate diameter

property.name: Fork inside soma
property.description: Position (3D) of the node that are internal to the soma and are forking. Most likely a human check.

property.name: Neurite intersection
property.description: Position (3D) of same-cell neurite intersection. Most likely a human check.

property.name: Missing neurite
property.description: Position (3D) of the nodes that are at the start of missing neurites. Most likely a human check.

property.name: Diameter divergence
property.description: Position (3D) of the nodes that have a diameter too different from the original dataset (stack, slice). Most likely a human check.

property.name: Incorrect neurite label
property.description: Position (3D) of the first node of a neurite branch that is incorrectly labeled. Most likely a human check.

property.name: Too small soma DICE coefficient
property.description: If the soma DICE coeffcient is within the rule's range, then the soma is said too small and this value should be true.

property.name: Axon button annotation
property.description: Axon length along which button were annotated.

property.name: Minimum value
property.description: The minimum value of the range.

property.name: Maximum value
property.description: The maximum value of the range.
